Wide shot, 16:9, 6 s, 24 fps, 4 K, photorealistic cinematic lighting. Cozy red-brick fireplace in a dimly lit living room; on blazing logs lies a bright chroma-green rectangular card #00FF00, 10 √ó 15 cm. Flames slowly engulf its edges, ash and sparks drift upward; smooth tripod shot with gentle zoom-in, dramatic sense of loss, no text.

Macro shot, 16:9, 4 s, 120 fps (high-speed), 4 K, shallow DOF f/1.8, ultra-detailed dramatic lighting. Extreme close-up inside fireplace: the same bright chroma-green card #00FF00, 10 √ó 15 cm, lying between glowing logs; flames lick the surface, edges char and curl, embers crackle, flying sparks pass the lens, photorealistic, no text.
